entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is described as crying and speaking to Harry and Luna in the corridor.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is asked by Harry what has happened, indicating she is present at the scene.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as dragging Luna to her feet and racing along the corridor with her.

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is standing at a smashed window in the classroom, yelling in shock at Harry's sudden appearance.

entities.name: sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is standing at a smashed window in the classroom, yelling in shock at Harry's sudden appearance.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as being dead and having taught his master tricks with a wand.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn catches up to Harry, panting and massaging his chest in emerald-green silk pajamas.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall speaks to Harry about what has happened, indicating a relationship between them.
Luna listens to Professor McGonagall's explanation of what has happened, showing a relationship between them.
Harry's sudden appearance startles Professor Flitwick, indicating a relationship between them.
Harry's sudden appearance also startles Professor Sprout, showing a relationship between them.
